title: This toy was a hit!
body: My 5 year old grandson liked this so much that he brought it to bed with him the day he got it. He woke up the next morning with his arms around it and a big smile on his face! This toy has brought him endless joy! It was easy to figure out and easy to transform. It appears to be a hardy toy and well made.

title: Very good toy
body: Excellent toy, but I recommend it for children over 5 years old.

title: My son loved it
body: I recommend this toy for kids. It's strong and easy to transform into a truck. My son loved it.

title: 👌
body: Super cool toy, but it hard at times to convert it from transformer to vehicle. A little confusing for my 4 year old. Durable, and comes with no accessories

title: A good quality toy, played with a lot!
body: He loves this toy a lot. Takes it everywhere.

title: Good buy
body: Easy to use, good detail, and not too heavy it’s annoying but heavy enough it will hold up.

title: Love it
body: My kid loves this toy, he refuses to put it down.

title: Fácil de transformar
body: Este juquetes es súper resistente, es el más grande que he conseguido se puede llevar a la calle porque no se pierden las piezas y es fácil de transformar

title: Recomendado. Niños 5+
body: Buen juguete. Buenas calidad. Lindo. Mi nieto quedó maravillado. ♥️

title: Size not accurate
body: The toy is just what my grandson wanted. I gave 4 ⭐️ because the sz is inaccurate. It says 11” however it’s 10”.
